alert.note: Alert for Allen; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 21 at 4:27PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST TUESDAY THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio, including the following areas, in northern Indiana, Adams, Allen IN, Blackford, Grant, Huntington, Jay and Wells. In northwest Ohio, Allen OH, Paulding, Putnam and Van Wert. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST Tuesday through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional rainfall amounts around 1 inch expected to fall. Saturated antecedent conditions along with frozen ground will lead to increased runoff leading to minor river flooding and flooding of low lying areas. Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
